about_the_game:
About This Game

Epiko World is an action-packed multiplayer battle game that seamlessly blends mythological storytelling with futuristic combat. Step into a vibrant universe where legendary heroes and gods clash in dynamic battlegrounds inspired by cultures from around the globe. Whether you’re engaging in fast-paced PvP matches, teaming up in 3v3 battles, or hunting down epic Ravagers, Epiko World delivers an adrenaline-filled experience for gamers of all skill levels.

Key Features

Dynamic Gameplay Modes

  • PvP Duels: Face off against opponents in intense 1v1 battles.

  • 3v3 Team Matches: Work together to dominate the battlefield in fast-paced strategic combat.

  • Free-for-All Chaos: Compete against up to seven players in a thrilling fight for supremacy.

  • Ravager Encounters: Hunt down powerful creatures within the arena for rare rewards and an edge in battle.

Mythology Meets Futurism

  • Play as gods, warriors, and futuristic heroes, each with unique abilities and weapons, blending ancient myths with cutting-edge technology.

  • Explore battlegrounds inspired by legendary locations such as Dwarka, Babylon, and Mayan temples, complete with dynamic weather and interactive terrain.

Customizable Heroes and Companions

  • Personalize your heroes with unlockable skins, weapons, and abilities to match your playstyle.

  • Summon powerful companions to assist in battle, offering tactical and magical advantages.

Progression and Rewards

  • Climb leaderboards and complete daily challenges to earn exclusive rewards.

  • Participate in global tournaments for a chance to win rare in-game items and claim your spot as a top competitor.

Cross-Ecosystem Integration

  • Bring your NFTs from Epiko Market to life, unlocking unique in-game benefits and customizations.

  • Connect your account through the Epiko Hub (coming soon), where gameplay activities and achievements will earn KARMA points for real-world and in-game rewards.

Why Choose Epiko World?

  • Immersive Storytelling: Dive into a world where every battle unfolds a story rooted in rich cultural myths.

  • Cutting-Edge Visuals: Experience stunning graphics, smooth animations, and vibrant environments.

  • Accessible and Competitive: Designed for casual players and hardcore gamers alike, with balanced gameplay and competitive features.

Prepare to unleash legendary heroes, conquer mythological realms, and forge your destiny in Epiko World! Will you rise to the challenge and claim victory? The battle awaits!!!

About This Game

Epiko World is an action-packed multiplayer battle game that seamlessly blends mythological storytelling with futuristic combat. Step into a vibrant universe where legendary heroes and gods clash in dynamic battlegrounds inspired by cultures from around the globe. Whether you’re engaging in fast-paced PvP matches, teaming up in 3v3 battles, or hunting down epic Ravagers, Epiko World delivers an adrenaline-filled experience for gamers of all skill levels.

Key Features

  • 3v3 Team Matches: Work together to dominate the battlefield in fast-paced strategic combat.

  • Free-for-All Chaos: Compete against up to seven players in a thrilling fight for supremacy.

  • Ravager Encounters: Hunt down powerful creatures within the arena for rare rewards and an edge in battle.

  • Play as gods, warriors, and futuristic heroes, each with unique abilities and weapons, blending ancient myths with cutting-edge technology.

  • Explore battlegrounds inspired by legendary locations such as Dwarka, Babylon, and Mayan temples, complete with dynamic weather and interactive terrain.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU (M1) or AMD Radeon Pro 560
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12.0 (Monterey) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro/Max
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Pro/Max GPU or AMD Radeon Pro 5700 XT
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Epiko World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Epiko World is a fast-paced multiplayer battle game where players engage in PvP duels, team-based combat, and free-for-all chaos. Customize legendary heroes, summon tactical companions, and fight in dynamic maps inspired by global mythology and cultural epics.
